section.subtitle: Effective March 2025
section.introParagraph: All contracts signed before August 2024 will be updated to the new deco.cx billing models. The purpose of these changes is to align our business model with the new features and capabilities of the product.

changes.title: 1. Seat-Based Pricing
changes.text: We're introducing user-based licensing. This means you'll now pay based on the number of users who have access to your project.

changes.title: 2. Usage-Based Hosting Fees
changes.text: We're replacing the pageview-based pricing model with a simpler, more transparent structure based on requests and bandwidth usage.

changes.title: 3. New Support Packages
changes.text: We're rolling out new premium support options for those who need more dedicated service and faster response times.

section.licensingParagraph: We offer two plan types -Pro and Enterprise, each with different features and capabilities.

licensingList.text: Pro Plan: Core features for standard projects.
Enterprise Plan: Advanced tools like SSO, custom permissions, and approval workflows.

features.text: Personalization tools: A/B testing, content segmentation
AI Copilot with 25 generations per user per month
Personalization tools: A/B testing, content segmentation
AI Copilot with 50 generations per user per month

seatsCalcSteps.value: Check the number of users accessing your project in the admin panel (excluding the deco.cx or carcara.tech teams). You can find this information in the Billing section under "Number of Seats."
Select the appropriate package from the pricing table below.

section.proExampleText: If your team has 12 users, you'll need the 20-seat package, which costs $160/month.
section.entExampleText: For 7 Builders and 25 Content Editors, choose:
section.hostingParagraph: We're moving away from the $8 per 10,000 pageviews model (which assumed 10 requests per pageview) and are shifting to a straightforward usage-based approach:
section.hostingExtraParagraph: Previously, we limited requests to 10 per pageview, with any excess billed at $0.08 per 1,000 extra requests (equivalent to $80 per 1 million requests). You can view your average request count in the Billing panel.

hostingExamples.label: Bandwidth Charges
hostingExamples.value: Bandwidth is billed at $1 per GB of data transfer. In the previous model, we included 1 GB per 10,000 pageviews, with any additional usage billed at $1 per GB.

hostingExamples.label: Example
hostingExamples.value: If your site consumed 150 GB last month: 150 * 1 = $150

supportList.title: 1. Community Support (Free)
supportList.text: Access our #deco-help channel on Discord, connect with other users, and join daily Q&A sessions with our #deco-pros. No guaranteed response time (SLA).

supportList.title: 2. Premium Support ($1,000/month)
supportList.text: Priority support via email and Discord tickets with a 24-hour response time SLA.

supportList.title: 3. Enterprise Support ($2,000/month)
supportList.text: Weekly check-ins, top-priority support, and a 5-hour response time SLA.

section.whyChangeTitle: Why Are We Making These Changes?
section.whyChangeParagraph1: Over the past year, we've enhanced the product and introduced features tailored for broader use cases, including internal tools projects and self-hosting.
section.whyChangeParagraph2: In light of these updates, our previous pricing model based solely on hosting no longer fits. The new structure is designed to offer better transparency and align with our expanded feature set.
section.whatToDoParagraph1: By February 2025, you'll need to sign the updated contract to continue using deco.cx services, confirming your acceptance of the new pricing terms. We'll be sending out the new agreements soon.
section.whatToDoParagraph2: To get a sense of your total costs under the new model, check out our:
